TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRequestSessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: Defines the interface to associate a request channel with a session.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestSessionChannel> interface indicates that an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IRequestChannel> implements <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> semantics.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IOutputSession> associated with its <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> can be retrieved through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> property.
